title: How to connect a Raspberry Pi to a smartphone screen - Quora

response.answer_text: VNC — Virtual Network Computing. VNC Viewer: Download VNC viewer for android from this link. VNC Server: VNC Connect from RealVNC is included with Raspbian. Refer this documentation link to enable VNC server of your raspberry pi. The first thing you need to know is your IP address on the Raspberry PI. To get this enter the following in a terminal window: ifconfig If you are in WiFi, the IP address will be next to the wlan0 entry and will be something like 192.168.1.x (where x is the last number).Open VNC viewer in your android device.Click on connect button.Hope this helps!!!. If you get stuck please comment. Follow me at Jose Praveen to learn more on Raspberry Pi, Hadoop topics.
Here is a tutorial explaining how to do this using VNC Server: Use Your Tablet As Raspberry Pi Screen
